about.html: Make Life A Ride is the first global brand campaign in the history of BMW Motorrad which dares to re-ignite the world of motorcycling that used to inspire generations. The campaign launched worldwide and has been running since 2014 in each of the local markets, telling relevant stories – from a female rock band in Brooklyn to a landscape photographer in Iceland.
